paths.name: User Experience Design
paths.tags: design research, UI frameworks, wireframes, user centric approach
paths.description: This Learning Path is a curriculum of UX Design courses, videos and resources from across the internet, organized into a logical sequence that a beginner can follow.

paths.name: MBA Essentials
paths.description: Learn core business skills and how to apply them professionally and in your personal life

paths.name: Android App Dev
paths.tags: material design, sensors, maps, location service, studio
paths.description: Learn android programming by building apps from scratch. Learn how to design and build Android apps and take your ideas to millions of people.

paths.name: Social Entrepreneurship
paths.tags: design solution, business plan, failing fast, learning quick
paths.description: A robust introduction to Social Entrepreneurship, Learn and build a roadmap to launch your very own social venture

paths.name: Apply to Y Combinator
paths.description: A set of resources from YC partners and alumni to help you turn in a strong YC application. This course is collection of Gautam Tambay, Founder, Springboard.

paths.name: Data Analysis
paths.description: Learn statistics, data wrangling and visualization with this free curriculum By an Airbnb/MIT alum. Learn how to manipulate and analyze data better with this free online curriculum

paths.name: Backend: Py/Django
paths.description: Learn how to build websites and web-apps from scratch using Python and Django. Build and deploy fully functional web applications. Become a full-stack developer with the help of one of the founder Paul.
